data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Azteca.
Jorge Perez signals a Juarez throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In the minute 1, Dario Lezcano scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Azteca.
Great play from Eryc Castillo to set up the goal.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 8, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Throw-in high up the field for Cruz Azul in Mexico City.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Perez awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Important block from the Juarez defence as Santiago Gimenez fires in a strike for Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Azteca.
Can Cruz Azul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juarez's half?
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Cruz Azul are coming forward and Adrian Aldrete gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 21, Luis Romo of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Cruz Azul's Santiago Gimenez has run offside.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Juarez.
Cruz Azul's Adrian Aldrete gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez close to the penalty box.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to Juarez's area.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
In the minute 31, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santiago Gimenez for Cruz Azul gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jorge Perez awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Yoshimar Yotun.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 37, Free kick Juarez.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Luis Lopez (Juarez) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 40, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Attention is being given to Cruz Azulâ€™s Yoshimar Yotun and play has been suspended briefly.
Misael Dominguez (Cruz Azul) has replaced the possibly injured Yoshimar Yotun at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 43, Santiago Gimenez of Cruz Azul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 45, Adrian Aldrete (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Juarez's half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Mexico City.
Santiago Gimenez for Cruz Azul is whistled offside.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cruz Azul are pushing forward but Juan Escobar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Azteca.
Goal! Jonathan Rodriguez gives Cruz Azul a 2-1 lead in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez's Eryc Castillo breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 56, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Juarez have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juarez.
In the minute 62, Cruz Azul take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Jonathan Rodriguez.
Santiago Gimenez with an assist there.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 65, Cruz Azul make their second substitution with Elias Hernandez replacing Santiago Gimenez.
In Mexico City Juarez attack through Jesus Zavala. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul's Rafael Baca is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Cruz Azul.
Juarez pushes forward through Dario Lezcano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 70, Dario Lezcano for Juarez gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jorge Perez awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Alberto Acosta is replacing Luis Lopez for Juarez at Estadio Azteca.
Alan Mendoza is replacing Martin Luis Galvan for the away team.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 71, Igor Lichnovsky for Cruz Azul has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
Juarez push forward at Estadio Azteca and Jefferson Intriago gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cruz Azul defence.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 73, Juarez's Dario Lezcano breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Jesus Zavala (Juarez) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Elias Hernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a Juarez throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Dario Lezcano, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Cruz Azul.
Dario Lezcano is back on his feet again.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 78, Carlos Rosel is on a sub for Flavio Santos for Juarez.
Adrian Aldrete (Cruz Azul) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
In the minute 80, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 82, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Alan Mendoza of Juarez is pulled up for offside.
Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a fourth substitution, with Brian Rubio replacing Eryc Castillo.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 86, Free kick in a good position for Juarez!
Robert Siboldi is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Milton Caraglio replacing Jonathan Rodriguez.
The home team have replaced Misael Dominguez with Ignacio Rivero. This is the fourth substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
In the minute 87, Goal! A headed strike from the away team reduces their deficit to 3-2. Gustavo Velazquez got above everyone else to nod it in.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Ignacio Rivero (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Mexico City Juarez drive forward through Dario Lezcano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Rafael Baca has recovered and rejoins the match in Mexico City.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Juarez's Brian Rubio has been booked in Mexico City.
The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rafael Baca, who is down injured.
